price: We know best what they will say – the most discerning among them will say, “You stayed no more than a day.”
arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذۡ يَقُولُ أَمۡثَلُهُمۡ طَرِيقَةً إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا يَوۡمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
